hero.catch-phrase: Your collections does NOT end up owning you.

feature.simple-description: Based on fan economy, tokyo.cards trading card NFT series is one of the best digital utility for community running.
feature.interactive-description: Trade, mint, exchange or decomposing trading cards with other players in the community.
feature.trustless-description: Built on blockchain, our trading card system runs autonomously without the need to trust and third party platform.

service.header-description: Find the right person in the community to exchange, trade or craft new collectables.
service.trading-description: Trade or exchange with anyone either with our partners or in person. Our market partner include OpenSea.io and Adam.jp, both provide wonderful services.
service.crafting-description: Can't find the item you wanted anywhere ? Try crafting it with disenchanted card parts. There is a chance to a better item during the process.
service.enchanting-description: Discover the magical power of enchanting by add more power to one of the items, or disenchant the item that is not needed any longer.
service.recycling-description: Unwanted NFTs from other NFT projects are welcomed here. Instead of leaving it in the wallet, smash it into pieces and craft something new.

usage.stack_upgrade_x_10: Usage: Turn 10 into a greater one
